author: Kerry Levielle
title: ‘The Sweet Life’ Trailer: Chris Messina and Abigail Spencer’s Melancholic Road Trip Turns Into a Touching Love Affair — Watch
text: Kenny and Lolita are two strangers from Chicago -- then she stops him from jumping off a bridge.
